metadata.Title: CVE-2019-10906 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Pallets Jinja before 2.10.1, str.format_map allows a sandbox escape.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-10906` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-jinja2 - 2.7.2-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
python3-jinja2 - 2.7.2-2ubuntu0.1~esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jinja2 package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.7.2-2ubuntu0.1~esm1').
